children.text: A thick orange border should be drawn around each of the 6 small blue rectangles below. Each of the blue rectangles must not protrude out of each of their respective orange borders.

rects.text: A thick orange border should be drawn around each of the 6 small blue rectangles below. Each of the blue rectangles must not protrude out of each of their respective orange borders.

children.text: This should be still true even after changing the window size.

rects.text: This should be still true even after changing the window size.
